messages.title: My pledges to you
messages.content: Fight the Government’s unfair school cuts. Prioritise tackling unemployment. Focus on Early Intervention. Work to secure the best deal from Brexit. Work for proper NHS funding.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Guarantee the Triple Lock for pensioners.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Investment into the NHS and social care
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Invest in NHS and social care services.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A million new homes over 5 years
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Build a million new homes over five years.

issues.brexitEurope: Work to secure the best deal from Brexit
issues.education: Fight the Government’s unfair school cuts. Focus on Early Intervention.

community.content: Lives in the constituency. Backed by Graham Allen. Local Councillor. Record of servicing our community.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have a strong track record in our community. I organised the successful Save Basford Hall College campaign. Today, the College has had £20m of investment and is a centre of excellence. For the last seven years I’ve also served as a governor of an Aspley school.

politicalExperience.achievements: Senior member of a Labour Council which has invested in the city, protected our city’s best loved buildings from closure and decay, and got the best public transport system outside London

examples: £10 an hour minimum wage

£20m of investment in Basford Hall College
Record of servicing our community
We need a strong, local voice in Parliament.
It's important that we build on Graham Allen's achievements of the past 30 years.
Nottingham North is better off with a Labour Government.
I have a strong track record in our community.
I organised the successful Save Basford Hall College campaign.

A fully-costed manifesto of policies that will make Britain a better place.
